Who rules the charts?

Reckon you can tell a chart topper from a chart flopper?

  1. Pick a year and start game
  2. Look at the artist and song
  3. Decide whether the next song was higher, lower or the same for it's peak chart position
  4. Achieve the highest score you can over 10 songs
  5. Share with friends

Use your ultimate music knowledge to see where a tune peaked against its chart rival and settle old scores with your pop foes.
